definition: to lean against/to rely on/on the basis of/no matter (how, what etc)/proof
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
to rely on/to depend on/by means of/thanks to/sth that one relies on
no matter what/despite/to allow (sb to act arbitrarily)
to visit a place for the memories/to pay homage to (the deceased)
Pingxiang county level city in Chongzuo 崇左[Chong2 zuo3], Guangxi
bill of warrant (certificate, allowing one to collect money or valuables)
to allow (sb to do as he pleases)
Pingxiang county level city in Chongzuo 崇左[Chong2 zuo3], Guangxi
(idiom) you can't rely on a verbal agreement/just because sb says sth, doesn't mean it's true

sentences.english: What makes my brother think he's so smart?
sentences.chinese: 我哥哥憑什麼認爲自己是那麼聰明？

sentences.english: Payment will be made by irrevocable Letter of Credit against presentation of documents to the issuing bank.
sentences.chinese: 付款方式爲憑單據以不可撤消的信用證向髮卡行議付。

sentences.english: I even didn't know where it is.
sentences.chinese: 我就莫了個名了，你憑什麼認爲是我喫的啊？

sentences.english: The audio book with a live goose, Donglai not far from Penglai.
sentences.chinese: 好把音書憑過雁，東萊不似蓬萊遠。

sentences.english: Just based only on the food here.
He wanted to win the horse No. 12 by straining his luck.
sentences.chinese: 他想憑他運氣把賭注押在了12號馬上。

sentences.english: I that speak in righteousness, mighty to save.
sentences.chinese: 就是我，是憑公義說話，以大能施行拯救。

sentences.english: Self-Serve Debit And Credit Card Only.
The token entitle you to two free admission to the museum.
sentences.chinese: 憑此券你可以得到兩張參觀博物館的免費入場券。

sentences.english: We must not act on assumptions.
sentences.chinese: 我們不能憑想當然辦事。

sentences.english: He wouldn't drone when he may live by honest labour.
sentences.chinese: 他可憑誠實的勞動生活時，他不願遊手好閒。

sentences.english: The existence of "The Expectant Duty Behavior" has its objective, realistic social foundation.
sentences.chinese: 這兩種人都憑主觀，忽視客觀實際事物的存在。

sentences.english: With personal business card or related proofs to achieve free passport.
sentences.chinese: 憑個人名片或相關職業證明獲取免費入場證。

sentences.english: Could he find it by scent?
This ticket entitles you to get a free French fries in the KFC.
sentences.chinese: 憑此券你可以在肯德基免費得到一份炸薯條。

definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
in those days/then/in those years/during that time
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
